# Test script for running seurat.

```{r}
# install and load Seurat
options(unzip = 'internal')
devtools::install_github("satijalab/seurat")
library(Seurat)
library(dplyr)
library(Matrix)
```

```{r}
test = Read10X(data.dir='/data/fearjm/larval_gonad/output/ovary1/outs/filtered_gene_bc_matrices/dm6.16')
dense.size = object.size(x = as.matrix(x=test))
dense.size

sparse.size = object.size(x = test)
sparse.size

dense.size / sparse.size
```

```{r}
test2 = CreateSeuratObject(raw.data = test, min.cells = 3, min.genes = 200, project = "10X_test")
```
